headlines.description: Eden Hazard scored his first goal in over two months to help Chelsea retain their place in the Premier League top four with a 2-1 win at Brighton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hazard the star as Chelsea win at Brighton

venue.fullName: The Friends Provident St Mary's Stadium

headlines.description: Two goals from Henrikh Mkhitaryan had twice brought Arsenal back from a goal down, with Danny Ings striking twice for the Saints.

video.headline: Southampton 3-2 Arsenal: Saints end Gunners' run

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC HIGHLIGHT (Southampton 3-2 Arsenal: Saints end Gunners' run) 2018/12/16 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Austin heads winner as Saints beat Arsenal

headlines.description: Sadio Mane had given Liverpool a first-half lead but United levelled through Jesse Lingard following an error from Allison before Shaqiri took over.
headlines.shortLinkText: Shaqiri strikes twice as Liverpool see off United
